NHAC TRU TINH $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<item> <title>[makelist.param1] </title> <link>$doregex[makelist2]</link> <thumbnail></thumbnail>
span class="" >(.*?)<\/span>\n.*?\n\n.*?\n.*?;list=(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPI7vHlKrg5xSzEfDAHErlQ
makelist2

dir="ltr" href="\/watch\?v=(.*?)".*?\n(.*?)\n https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=[makelist.param2]
